item.description:
Looking over routes and found a 12 Miler with cutoffs for 5 & 10 miles.

 

Hamden– Trail and Hill Route 12.0 Miler

Trail Left to Right on River Rd Water (mile 2.0)

Cross RT 10 to Left on Tuttle (mile 2.9)

Bear left to stay on Tuttle Avenue (mile 3.8)

Stop at Tuttle & Old Farms Rd Water (mile 4.3)

Stay on Tuttle to Left on Cook Hill Rd (mile 5.0)

Cross RT 10 to South. Brooksvale Rd (mile 6.7)

S. Brooksvale to Left on Trail (mile 7.5)

Stop on trail at River Road Water (mile 9.5)

Run past parking lot for 2 minutes (mile 11.5)

Turn around to parking lot FINISH 12.0 Miles

-------------------------------------------------------

Hamden – Trail and Road Route 10.0 Miler

Trail Left to Right on River Rd Water (mile 2.0)

Cross RT 10 onto River Road (mile 2.1)

Left at end of road on Tuttle Ave (mile 2.9)

Bear left to stay on Tuttle Ave (mile 3.8)

Left on Old Farms Road Water (mile 4.3)

Right on Whitney, Left on Mt. Sanford (mile 6.0)

Left on Trail (mile 6.5)

Stop on trail at River Rd. Water (mile 8.0)

Parking lot FINISH 10.0 Miles

--------------------------------------------------------

Hamden – Trail and Road Route 5.0 Miler

Trail Left to Right on River Rd Water (mile 2.0)

Cross RT 10 onto River Road (mile 2.1)

Right on Macarthur Drive (mile2.3)

Right on to Garvin Road (mile 2.6)

Left on River Road (mile 2.8)

Cross Whitney to Left on Trail Water (mile 3.0)

Parking lot FINISH 5.0 Miles
item.how_to_find_us: Easy to spot in Parking Lot across from Quinnipiac York Hill Campus
item.name: Hamden Trail Run
